summary: Tested all requested features for iteration 27: ricette import (90 ricette), anno selector (2023-2026), IVA page with different monthly data, supplier delete with linked invoices (400 error), force delete, and supplier search. All 15 backend tests passed. Frontend tests confirmed anno selector has 2023-2026, IVA page shows 12 unique monthly values for 2024, and Fornitori page handles delete errors correctly.

issues: Chart components show warnings about width/height being -1 - minor console warnings but charts render correctly

seed_data_creation: Created and deleted TEST_ITERATION_27_DELETE supplier for force delete testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working: 90 ricette in DB, anno selector includes 2023-2026, IVA 2024 shows different values per month, supplier delete with invoices returns 400, force delete works, supplier search works.

iva_2024_monthly_data.details: 12 months with unique IVA credito values ranging from €4,272.75 to €13,327.66

delete_supplier_with_invoices.details: DELETE /api/suppliers/{id} returns 400 with message 'Impossibile eliminare: 2 fatture collegate'

supplier_search.details: GET /api/suppliers?search=Testo returns Testo S.p.A. with fatture_count=2
